typedef.name: TagID
typedef.doc: The ID for a tag. As explained in ant_identification myrmidon doesn't allows to access tracking tag data directly, but through the definition of fort::myrmidon::Ant and fort::myrmidon::Identification.

function.name: FormatTagID
function.brief: Formats a TagID to convention format

return.doc: tagID formatted to the myrmidon convetion for fort::myrmidon::TagID.
